creditline: Gift of Carol and Jeffrey Horvitz
description: wide, rounded bottom that is slightly squared off at top of widest part; low shoulder with the majority of the body as the "neck"; uneven, round, slanted top with a "X" pattern around opening; two loop handles, on each side of neck; maroon and tan; round lid with rough maroon knob handle
signed: incised on bottom exterior and interior as well as bottom of lid
title: Water container (mizusashi)
